#summary Astar search algorithm

= Introduction =

The popluar A* search or A-star search algorithm searches a cost map for the optimal route from a start point to a destination.  

= Details =

After one route is found, any searched route estimated to be longer than the found route is discarded.  Routes with lower estimates are searched first.  The estimate uses the city-block measure of distance.
